description: The table ORDER_RES_AUDIT stores audit data for result finding.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_DAT
columns.description: This column stores a unique, internal contact date, in decimal format, when the audit action occurred for this result finding.

columns.name: AUDIT_ITEM
columns.description: The result finding item that was modified in the audited action performed for this record.

columns.name: RES_AUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the user who enacted the audit action for the items modified in this row.

columns.name: AUDIT_DTTM
columns.description: This column records the instant at which the audit action was performed for this row.
